    • Method Detail

      • monitorProperty

        public static final void monitorProperty(javafx.beans.property.ReadOnlyProperty<?> property,
                                         java.lang.String identifier)
        Monitor a javafx property. Each change on property will trigger the given message type. The property is set as source and the new value is given as content.
        Parameters:
        property - to be monitored.
        identifier - to use for sending messages.

      • monitorProperty

        public static final void monitorProperty(javafx.beans.property.ReadOnlyProperty<?> property,
                                         java.lang.String getIdentifier,
                                         java.lang.String setIdentifier)
        Monitor a javafx property. Each change on property will trigger the given message type. The property is set as source and the new value is given as content.
        Parameters:
        property - to be monitored.
        getIdentifier - the message identifier to use to get value when changed
        setIdentifier - the message identifier to use to set the value to the message content.

      • monitorProperty

        public static final void monitorProperty(java.lang.Object context,
                                         javafx.beans.property.ReadOnlyProperty<?> property,
                                         java.lang.String getIdentifier,
                                         java.lang.String setIdentifier)
        Monitor a javafx property. Each change on property will trigger the given message type. The property is set as source and the new value is given as content.
        Parameters:
        context - the context
        property - to be monitored.
        getIdentifier - the message identifier to use to get value when changed
        setIdentifier - the message identifier to use to set the value to the message content.
